item.title: Enovis CORP 10-K
item.description: Enovis CORP, which is in the Orthopedic, Prosthetic & Surgical Appliances & Supplies [3842] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 01, 2023 had 38833 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 490 instances million - 377 instances 2022 - 322 instances financial - 299 instances operations - 288 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
